name: Albanian Skills 5
description: We are an independent Albanian Swiss initiative without any economic intentions. It’s our strong belief that a country’s functioning economy necessarily needs well-skilled and qualified professionals in addition to theoretically educated academics. Therefore we are also convinced that a good education system must be built on a strong system of vocational education and training.We want to promote skills and thereby improve the recognition and status of vocational education and training in the Albanian society. For this purpose we annually organize Skills Competitions in Albania.

data.name: Platforme elektronike per te nxenit e te rriturve ne Europe.
data.description: Ne kuadrin e "Albanian Skills Week" do te mbahet nje event ne "Tirana Bussines Park" persa i perket te nxenit te te rriturve ne Europe. EPALE eshte nje komunitet europian, shumegjuhesh dhe i hapur i anetaresimit te profesionisteve te te mesuarit per te rritur, duke perfshire trajneret e te rriturve, stafin drejtues dhe  mbeshtetes, kerkuesit, akademiket dhe politikeberesit.
